media:group.media:title: code.talks 2022 - Building a decentralised pub/sub
media:group.media:description:
by Matthew Fontana

During the presentation Streamrâ€™s co-founder and CEO Henri Pihkala will take a deep dive into building Streamr, a decentralized pub/sub network for real-time data. He will answer the question of how we can transport, share and monetize data in a secure and scalable manner without intermediaries. And he will elaborate on how new types of data pipelines and ecosystems support and accelerate the birth of the decentralized web or Web 3.0.
